message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $150 for it. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, I understand that $180 is a bit steep for you, but I'm still willing to make a deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $165. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings, and I think you'll really benefit from it.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $165 is still a bit too high for me. I'm really hoping to get this product for $150.  If you can't meet me there, I'll have to go with John's offer.
